docs.title: CV
docs.text:
I'm a second-year Computer Science Engineering student who loves using technology to help people. I'm really into writing and |explaining technical stuff in a way that's easy to understand. Outside of classes, I volunteer with a group that uses tech to make a positive impact on society. It's cool to see how we can use what we know to help others. I'm always learning and looking for ways to use my skills to make a difference. I'm excited to see where this journey takes me and how I can keep making the world a better place with tech.

🎓 Educational Background

COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING ROORKEE UNIVERSITY (September 2022 - November 2026)

  • B.tech-Computer Science Engineering | Majors - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

    💼 Volunteer & Experience

    Volunteer ((Datakind) - September 2023 - September 2023)

    • Worked with 300 Volunteers in project Gender, in data dive event, got exposure to working with big datasets provided. By World Bank with cooperation of IMF (International monetary fund) goal was to analyse socio-economic conditions. Having Gender as a deterministic feature, Volunteers were from various countries. Using Data Science for community service.

    Applied Data Science ((IBM) - June 2023 - September 2023)

    • Technical Training on Open Shift and Red hat, from IBM, was among top 40 teams selected from about 4000 teams across the country that participated in the IBM Hack challenge 2023.

    Teacher/Technical Team Member ((TRAIC) - Nov 2022 - Sept 2023)

    • As a Technical Team Member, helped in conducting Hackathons and technical events at my college. Taught concepts of Arduino, Raspberry-Pi to students.

      Campus Ambassador/Content Writer ((CAREERS360) - July 2023)

      • Responsibilities include writing content related to placement statistics of colleges in my region on Careers360.

      💡 Skills

      Languages: Python   |    Frameworks: Flask, Bootstrap   |    Web: JavaScript   |   Operating System: Windows, Linux   |   Software: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Tableau   |   Data Visualization libraries: Seaborn, Matplotlib   |   User Interface design: Figma, Adobe XD   |   Version Control: Git, GitHub   |   Compilers: GCC, GDB   |   UNIX Shell Scripting

      🚀 Projects

      Placement Prediction web app 👉link

      • A small web app built using Flask, Python, HTML, CSS to predict placement status of student. Built a Python model depending on various features like gender, majors, grades, specialization, stream. Wrote a report on findings from data.

      UNIX Scripting projects 👉 link

      • Monitoring Free RAM Space | Archive older logs | User Management

      Weed detection rover

      • Building a rover with Arduino nano to detect weed and suggest the amount of pesticide to be sprinkled. Goal is to help farmers sprinkle pesticide without harming neighbouring plants.
      💡 Hackathons

      UTU Socio Kauthig Hackathon 2023 Winner

      • Won 1st position hackathon by building weed detection rover, total colleges were 25-30, organized by Govt of Uttarakhand, G20 in Dehradun.

      IBM Hack Challenge 2023 Finalist

      • Made it to top 40 teams selected from 26,000 participants across the country to be presented to IBM jury, by building placement prediction web app using Flask, Python, IBM Watson studio and writing findings in proper data insights in the project report.
